title: Emprez BI Module - Report : Work, late arrivals, Absences and amounts paid per employee - selection by structures and groups
content: This report will give you an overview of the following data for a group of employees over a period of up to 90 days:TimesheetsLate arrivalsAbsenteeism: Number of authorized absences, non authorized abs., absenteeism ratePremiumsThe report is divided into several sheets, one sheet per employee.Each data is accompanied by the average of the company, you can also choose to display the Emprez index for a comparison to other companies of the same type as yours.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
